content.text: Shining Fates brings sparkle and excitement to every deck, celebrating rare and radiant Pokémon from across the Galar region. Featuring Shiny Pokémon, dazzling full-art cards, and powerful attacks, this expansion rewards Trainers who seek both strategy and collectibility. With glittering artwork, fan-favorite Pokémon, and gameplay that shines in every match, Shining Fates invites you to chase brilliance and capture the extraordinary.
